message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a fair deal, how about we go 55-45?
I can meet you in the middle, 58-42 is my final offer for now
I'm willing to compromise, but it needs to be reasonable.  52-48 is my counter.
I see we're getting closer, 57-43 and we can call it a day
This is a very fair offer Alice, and I need you to agree before inflation eats away at the deal any further.
You're right about inflation, I'll meet you closer, 56-44 is my new offer
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Take it or leave it.
